name: Step by step [GGJ 2019]
description:
What does "home" mean to you ?

For us, it is a place where we feel safe. It can be a location. It can be someone's arms. And in the case of our protagonist: her mother's arms.

A new life can be scary

Moving into a new house, with a step-father that frighten you can be hard for a child... In Step by step, you must reach your mom while avoiding your step-monster-dad. 

Hide behind furniture, comfort yourself with teddy bears, avoid objects that make you anxious and try not to get caught by the one who, you think, brought darkness to your old life. 

Controls

  • Use Q & D (or the left and right arrows) to move to the left or to the right
  • Press E to hide
  • Press SPACE to scream in order to reduce your anxiety

A game made in 48 hours

Step by Step was made during the Global Game Jam  2019.
